formulas.description: Provides a color-coded and concise description of how early or late a task is scheduled.
formulas.raw: if(toNumber(dateBetween(prop("Due"), prop("Do"), "days")) == 0,"游리  Just in time",if(toNumber(dateBetween(prop("Due"), prop("Do"), "days")) > 0,concat("游릭  ", format(abs(toNumber(dateBetween(prop("Due"), prop("Do"), "days")))), " ", if(abs(prop("do to due")) <= 1, "day", "days"), " early"),concat("游댮  ", format(abs(toNumber(dateBetween(prop("Due"), prop("Do"), "days")))), " ", if(abs(prop("do to due")) <= 1, "day", "days"), " late")))

formulas.description: Provides a numeric representation of the difference between due date and "do" date.
